metadata.name: Inspiration
metadata.description:
"Inspiration" draws from Brancusi's style, capturing the essence of its concept through primal shapes and materials. 

A central square symbolizes the initial spark, lit at the tip with a white gradient representing the light of inspiration or spark that echoes the nature of ideas. 

A dynamic curve flows through the image, representing the journey of exploration and creativity. It reflects the organic fluidity and vitality of inspiration. at the base a reflective orb emerges, symbolizing the result of creation, the product of the inspiration. 

 "Inspiration" is an image generated using midjourney, prompted with primal shapes and materials, paying homage to Brancusi's principles by embracing simplicity and exploring the interplay between essential forms and transformative energy.

This piece was chosen to be exhibited in the Constantin Brancusi Centre of the Craiova Art Museum in Romania for the group show "Homage" by A2 AccelerateArt curated by Claire Silver.
